alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 8:43PM EDT until March 14 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .The Ohio River will continue to fall, dropping below flood stage at Olmsted and Cairo over the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 41.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 26.1 feet Thursday, March 23. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
